body.name: Molekule Air Mini+ | Air Purifier for Small Home Rooms up to 250 sq. ft. with PECO-HEPA Tri-Power Filter for Mold, Smoke, Dust, Bacteria, Viruses & Pollutants for Clean Air - White, Alexa-Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 19 mins
features: FDA-Cleared Air Purification: Molekule Air Mini+ is FDA-cleared as a 510(k) Class II medical device to destroy viruses and bacteria (FDA Registration Number: Fl: 3019585201 CA: 3016681262.)
Designed for Smaller Spaces: For small rooms up to 250 sq. ft. like studio apartments, kids’ bedrooms, and home offices.
The ONLY PECO-HEPA Filter: Unique technology that captures 99.97% of small particles and destroys organic pollutants like chemicals, pet dander, pollen, viruses, bacteria, mold and other pollutants.
Portable Air Purification: With its vegan leather handle, Molekule Air Mini + can be easily carried and plugged in anywhere in the home or business for increased flexibility.
Particle Sensor: Detect and track PM2.5 levels over time in the app.
body.description: Form, meet function. Introducing Molekule Air Mini+: This 510(k) Class II medical device features a 360-degree air intake that replaces the air in a 250-square-foot room. Welcome to a whole new air purification experience— unobtrusive, portable, and effective. The air we breathe in our homes can affect our exercise performance, our sleep, and most importantly, our health. Molekule’s PECO-HEPA Tri-Powered air filter features the combined forces of Molekule’s own patented PECO technology that destroys viruses, bacteria, mold, allergens, VOCs, and more; True HEPA 99.97% particle-capture efficiency rate; and a layer of carbon filtration to reduce odors and toxic gasses. The Air Mini+ purifier is FDA-cleared for medical use to destroy bacteria and viruses, viruses & mold, and collect particles, as the particle sensor in the Air Mini+ detects and categorizes pollutants from 10 microns down to 0.3 microns. Designed for small spaces up to 250 sq. ft, the Air Mini+ provides portable, medical-grade air purification for cleaner air. Take a deep breath and feel the difference: more fresh, more crisp, more pure. That’s our air, and yours, born anew.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Wipe down the device with a clean, dy, non-abrasive cloth. Avoid liquid cleaning agents or water. Make sure to change your filter every six months.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the PECO-HEPA Tri-Power Filter. Our most advanced filter yet, featuring the combined forces of Molekule’s own patented PECO technology with true HEPA 99.97% particle-capture efficiency rate, finished with a layer of carbon filtration to reduce odors and toxic gases. Air Mini+: Auto Protect for small rooms Designed for rooms up to 250 sq ft, Air Mini+ detects air particles and adjusts the fan speed for you. Its onboard sensor lets it display particle levels, while Auto Protect mode increases airflow to deal with dirty air when you need it most. Air Mini+ will excel in smaller rooms like bedrooms, home offices, nurseries, and small kitchens. Place it in a central location on a shelf, stand, or table to maximize air intake, running 24/7 to keep the fresh air flowing. Clean air in the palm of your hand. Air history – Track your indoor air quality over time & gain deeper knowledge of what you’re breathing with newly expanded air history stats.Indoor air quality tracking – Toggle between day & week view and swipe through your air history as Air Mini+ tracks particle levels. Go back as far as the previous four weeks, or see changes in five-minute increments.Daily & weekly air quality totals – See how Air Mini+ rates your indoor air quality as Good, Moderate, Bad, or Very bad, and view your top 3 air quality offenders.Remote operation – Control fan speeds, enable Auto-Protect mode, and check filter status, all from your phone.

Intake Air Mini+ intakes air from the surrounding 360 degrees in rooms up to 250 sq ft. Capture Air flows through the outer filter layers, trapping large particles, and slowing down chemicals passing through the filter. Destruction Purification at it’s best. The nanocatalyst-coated filter layers react to light, destroying pollutants and leaving behind clean air.

Air Pro Air Mini+ Room size 1000 sq. ft. 250 sq. ft. Filters 1 PECO-HEPA Tri-Power filter 1 PECO-HEPA Tri-Power filter Fan speeds 2 Auto Protect modes & 6 manual speeds Auto Protect mode & 5 manual speeds Controls Digital touch display & App Touch display & App Body material Anodized aluminum Medical grade polycarbonate Handle material Vegan leather — natural Vegan leather — natural

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Killing viruses and Taking Names
reviews.reviewText: It took a perfect storm of events to make me spring for the Air Mini+. I’m spending far too much time indoors. Concerns over CoVid19. Moldy odors in my living room. Allergies to bushes that grow outside my bedroom. Oh, and I’ve got two big hairy GSD dogs that love to go in and out of the house bringing in all manner of dust. So I finally decided to buy this. It arrived in two days. It’s very nicely packed in a specially fitted box with a beautiful one page set of directions on brown Kraft paper plus another booklet (that I didn’t read) and it’s own drawstring bag. Within a few minutes I had twisted off the top, taken out the plastic wrapped filter, put the filter back in, twisted the top back on and had it plugged in; it came right on. I downloaded the app, entered my wifi password and the app immediately recognized the device. Took maybe all of ten minutes tops from box opening to registering on the app. So does it work? Well I thought it would be weeks. I just had it running while I sat watching tv. It was like 3 feet away. Within 2 hours I could tell the air I was breathing in was so fresh and clean. Like wow! It works and super fast too. I think even my dogs liked it as they usually lay in different areas of the house but they both napped within 2 feet of it. The app and physical device design are both well thought out. For the app, I can easily turn it on, off, adjust fan level, or see if the particulate matter is good or bad. If you don’t already have your phone in your hand, like when would that ever happen? You can also just touch the center of the grey circular part of the purifier to do this which is cool but is not intuitive (seriously, at first, I was looking for an on button to push, LOL). I guess I could’ve read the directions. The handle/strap is a nifty way to take it from room to room. It doesn’t weigh that much. I also like the ingenious cord wrap on the bottom so I can uncoil a longer length or recoil it to shorten to reach the outlet with a just right amount of cord. On auto-protect, the fan is a quiet white-noise level. I was watching tv and it did not impact my hearing of Voldemort’s hissing whispers. If you turn the fan up to level 4 or 5 it does make more noise but why would I need that? Maybe for when I cook those campfire smoky meals. If you couldn’t tell already, I’m overall impressed and happy with this purchase.There are less expensive air purifiers out there but this is the only one I saw that killed viruses. Take that CoVid19. Everyone needs one of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Filters VOCs, plus small particulate matters that can cause infections
reviews.reviewText: This VOC air filter includes a hepa filter which can also trap COVID. Needed a VOC filter because new apartment is full of particle board cabinets in kitchen, bathrooms, doors, door frames, laminate floors, baseboards-there’s no real wood anywhere. The place is filled with toxic chemicals & I have autoimmune interstitial lung disease, so must protect my lungs as well as my body. VOCs off-gas for years. These gases contain formaldehyde, neurotoxic chemicals & carcinogens, ie: “legal poison.” I like the compactness of the unit, a neutral white. Attractive, lightweight, & easy for me, in a wheelchair, to move from room to room. Others complain of noise. I’ve had other filters that were horribly noisy, in fact so noisy that I didn’t want to use them. I don’t find this filter to be noisy. The highest fan speed of course is more loud but I’m sure people set their TV volume much louder. I’ve not yet gone through the process of connecting it to my smart phone. If it’s difficult, I’ll get my computer saavy friend to do it for me. I bought 2, one for bedroom, one for kitchen/living área. I usually keep it on fan speed three, 24/7, because the apartment building is totally new-I’m the 1st occupant in this apartment. The Molekule is a bit pricey, but remember, it’s actually 2 filters-a VOC filter & a hepa filter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WASTE OF MONEY
reviews.reviewText: This thing WORKS! A bit expensive, but worth it if you're asthmatic like me. Plugged it in and within 10 minutes I was breathing clearly! Haven't used my inhaler since I plugged it in! One negative.... For some reason, I can't get my phone to connect to it via WiFi. Not a deal breaker, but would be nice to have the app assist.EDIT: Had this thing for four months now and it no longer works. Changed the filter 3 times already. It turns on and runs like normal, but the air isn't being filtered. I'm back to waking up with a stuffy nose and asthma symptoms.Check their Better Business Bureau LONG list of complaints. I'm not even going to bother with trying to return it. Not worth the hassle or trouble everybody else has had with them. I'll just buy a better brand of air purifier.DO NOT waste your money on this junk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works better than anything you’ll find
reviews.reviewText: This thing can be a jet engine, or just a quiet fan. The moment I start spray painting in my art room I can hear is rev up 2 rooms away. The app shows you exactly what is in the air, how bad it is. Compared to other purifiers this thing is high tech, high end, and works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my purchase.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great air purifier. I like that it is always on and detects when the air quality is compromised and automatically sets it to a higher setting. It’s very quiet when it’s on auto, but can sound like a strong fan when the higher settings are used. The unit is pretty compact but does a great job for a bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars recommend, just a little loud
reviews.reviewText: I did a bunch of research on air purifiers and settled on this one. I was looking for one that would destroy mold particles in the air and purify the toxins from a new building space once we move. The first Molekule we received was broken. I had to call and troubleshoot and was super disappointed that something soooo expensive was broken upon arrival. I sent it back and got a replacement, and was very happy the new one worked! I’ve had it for a week and can tell a difference in my room. My kids love keeping an eye on the color coded sensor for particles in the air and I can say that we are are breathing better. The only cons are what others have said: 1) the off gassing smells terrible for the first 24 hours and 2) the noise on level 4 and 5 really does sound like an airplane taking off! All other levels are good though. Oh and I love the look!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth operation purifier
reviews.reviewText: Plug n go air purifier runs quiet and links to app with no issues so far. Happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy bueno el purificador pero la app no funciona
reviews.reviewText: Después de tanto investigar y decidir comprar este purificador, una decepción ver que la app no funciona. El proceso para darlo de alta nunca funcionó. Contacté a soporte técnico y no me pudieron ayudar. Es una pena que un artículo tan caro tenga una app tan pobre. Es quizá la peor aplicación que he usado. Una pena pero lo voy a devolver. Todas las opiniones en el App Store y en Google Play Store dicen lo mismo. No gasten su dinero!

reviews.reviewTitle: Spent 4 hours trying to pair it with the app
reviews.reviewText: Spent 4 hours trying to pair Air Mini+ with the app but for some reason it just won't connect. Stuck on wi-fi details password screen forever. It shows up in my router device list. But the app just won't connect. Lame!

reviews.reviewTitle: Overall Good, App Okay and does not show exact PM2.5 number Oly show 5 colours
reviews.reviewText: Overall Good, App Okay and does not show exact PM2.5 number Only show 5 colours.Editing the review rating to 1, I have baught it on amazon recommendation.Now there is no filter available and in the market no other sale it.pathetic service.The insurance company also declined its insurance.
I have tried the product, the plus model is doesn't do anything extra, sensor provided is always faulty, connecting through app takes 100 times, even after that, it will get disconnected
Defective product.particle sensor does not work.poor connectivity to app . As it is imported from abroad,gets damaged in transit
